meanings.definition: A person who directs a theatrical production.
meanings.sent1: The regisseurs guided the actors during the play rehearsal.
meanings.sent2: The regisseurs worked together to create a stunning performance.
meanings.sent3: The regisseurs decided to switch roles and act in the play instead.
meanings.sent4: The regisseurs were the conductors of the theatrical orchestra.
meanings.sent5: The regisseurs' vision brought the play to life on stage.

meanings.definition: Plural form of 'regisseur', referring to multiple directors of theatrical productions.
meanings.sent1: The regisseurs collaborated on different aspects of the play production.
meanings.sent2: The regisseurs' diverse styles added depth to the performances.
meanings.sent3: The regisseurs accidentally wore matching outfits to the premiere.
meanings.sent4: The regisseurs' unity was evident in the seamless transitions between scenes.
meanings.sent5: The regisseurs' dedication ensured the success of the show.
